articles.title: Chromebooks just had their best year ever - The Verge
articles.description: Research reports that over 30 million Chromebooks shipped this year, with around 11 million units moving in Q4 alone. Last year saw only 14.7 million Chromebooks ship, indicating huge growth for the computers.
articles.content:
Four times as many Chromebooks were sold in 2020 than in 2019
